name: iPhone
description: Apple's original iPhone introduced multi-touch and combined an iPod, phone and internet communicator into one device.
fun_facts: First iPhone did not support third-party native apps — only web apps.
Announced by Steve Jobs on January 9, 2007, at Macworld.

name: iPhone 3G
description: Apple's iPhone 3G brought 3G speeds, built-in GPS, and access to the brand-new App Store, setting the foundation for today's smartpphones
fun_facts: It was the first iPhone to support 3G networks
it introduced the app store, paving the way for millions of apps and changing how we use smartphones forever
